4x^2 - 36x + 81 = (2x - 9)(2x - 9) = (2x - 9)^2

Since both terms are the same, the equation has a repeated root of x = 9/2. Therefore, the roots of the equation are x = 9/2, 9/2.

Since the equation had a repeated root, there was no need to use the quadratic formula.
